name: The Final Judgement
description:
This game is not a full game. It is simply a short environment experience created by me in an effort to test my ability to create an environment for a game engine. 

I created this environment based off of the judgement tarot card. I defined seeing this card to mean new beginnings, so I designed this environment to be about new beginnings.

https://shazam53.artstation.com/projects/v2OPdA - Some behind the scenes for the creation.
